title: Zepp Golf: How to mount your sensor
description:
A tutorial from Zepp Labs on Zepp Golf and how to mount your Zepp sensor on your golf glove.

Abt is a proud authorized retailer of Zepp Wearable Sport Technology. Shop for the Zepp Swing Analyzer Golf Glove Mount as well as the full line of Zepp products at Abt today!
